greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: n-th row is the lexicographically earliest arithmetic progression of n primes beginning with A007918(n).
comment: If we omit the first row, is this the same triangle as A113460? Equivalently, do A061558 and A113461 agree apart from the initial term? Answer: almost certainly not!
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..153
Index entries for sequences related to primes in arithmetic progressions
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 22 2007, Oct 17 2007
